channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Intense thunderstorms to hit Texas Friday ahead of looming omega block weather pattern
Powerful storm in Pennsylvania caught on video as tree crashes onto parked car
Barbara Corcoran says it’s ‘a good time to buy’ a home in the US — despite 77% of Americans feeling otherwise
Belarus opposition warns against concessions to Lukashenko over release of US prisoner
82 people facing newly created criminal charge for entry along NM-Mexico border
Trump replacing Waltz as national security adviser, Rubio takes role for now
item.description: Trump said he's nominating Michael Waltz to be ambassador to the United Nations, while Secretary of State Marco Rubio will serve as interim national s...

item.title: WATCH: 500 dachshunds try to set world record
item.description: The dashing dachshunds descended upon Budapest in an attempt to fetch the record for the largest single-breed dog walk.

item.title: Trump says admin 'going to be taking away' Harvard's tax exempt status
item.description: "It's what they deserve," he said, renewing his threat in a Truth Social post.

item.title: 5/2: CBS Morning News
item.description: Mike Waltz out as national security adviser, tapped for U.N. ambassador; NASA astronauts perform 5th-ever all-female spacewalk.

item.title: Prince Harry loses bid to reinstate security on visits to UK
item.description: Harry challenged a U.K. government decision about his security.

item.title: A loophole expires Friday. Here's what that means for shoppers.
item.description: Cheaper goods from China are no longer exempt from import duties, which could sharply raise points for consumers.

item.title: Ex-agent, wife murdered after he testified against drug lord's son
item.description: Ivan Morales was a prosecution witness in the U.S. trial of Ruben Oseguera Gonzalez, the son of the country's most wanted man, "El Mencho."

item.title: Earthquake, tsunami warning off coast of Chile and Argentina
item.description: A 7.4 magnitude earthquake struck off the southern coasts of Chile and Argentina on Friday, the United States Geological Survey said.

item.title: Student murdered by ex thought she was meeting him one last time
item.description: Catina Salarno's sister, Nina Salarno, became a prosecutor in California to warn others about a common tactic abusers use.

item.title: Man charged with attempted murder in hit-and-run outside church preschool
item.description: The man accused of driving into two children and an adult in a hit-and-run outside a preschool at a South Carolina church has been charged.

item.title: The Justice Department ended a decades-old school desegregation order. Others are expected to fall
Trump’s health agency urges therapy for transgender youth, not broader gender-affirming health care
Justice Department sues Hawaii, Michigan over plans to sue fossil fuel companies for climate harm
item.description: The Justice Department is suing two states over their planned lawsuits against fossil fuel companies for harms caused by climate change.
